title: Chongchong Yu Long Long
synopsis: "Chong Chong and Dragon Dragon" tells that when the toy world is corroded by the dark stone, the four guardian gods of the wisdom tree and humans (Xiao Chong, etc.) unite to fight against all controlled toys and forge the charm of the brave to fight against grievances. The story that saved the entire toy world and the human world. Expressing love and courage will eventually defeat evil, while admonishing us to cherish our relatives, friends, and all the good things around us. (translated from douban)
